text: Blue Desert is a 1991 American psychological thriller movie directed by Bradley Battersby and starring Courteney Cox, D. B. Sweeney, Craig Sheffer. It was distributed by First World Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1991 thriller movies Category:1990s psychological movies Category:American thriller movies Category:American independent movies Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in New Mexico
title: Blue Desert (movie)
